byline.original: By JOSH KRON and MOHAMED IBRAHIM

abstract: Islamist militants rally hundreds of supporters outside Mogadishu, Somalia, to call for attacks on Kenya in response to Kenya sending hundreds of troops across the border; Kenyan authorities report an assault inside Kenya, with at least four people killed in an ambush near the Somali border.
snippet: A rallying call for Islamist militants gathered outside Somalia’s capital was, “We want huge blasts,” in attacks on neighboring Kenya.
lead_paragraph: A rallying call for Islamist militants gathered outside Somalia’s capital was, “We want huge blasts,” in attacks on neighboring Kenya.

headline.main: Somali Islamist Militants Rally Against Kenya
headline.print_headline: Somali Islamist Militants Rally Against Kenya
